description: Detects the execution of other scripts using the Node executable packaged with Adobe Creative Cloud Author: Max Altgelt. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Node Process Executions
query: (process.executable:*\\Adobe\ Creative\ Cloud\ Experience\\libs\\node.exe AND (NOT (process.command_line:*Adobe\ Creative\ Cloud\ Experience\\js*)))
